description: Gestational time limits will double to 24 weeks and only one doctor will need to approve an abortion.
title: Guernsey abortion laws to be 'modernised' by States
title_page: Guernsey abortion laws to be 'modernised' by States - BBC News
maintext: "What we have tried to do as a committee... is to try and find a way through that is as compassionate as it can be, as fair as it can be."
